channel.title: CVE Feed for PukiWiki Development Team -- PukiWiki
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PukiWiki Development Team -- PukiWiki

item.title: CVE-2022-27637|2024-08-03T05:32:59.922Z -- pukiwiki%20development%20team -- pukiwiki
item.description: Reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability in PukiWiki versions 1.5.1 to 1.5.3 allows a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-34486|2024-08-03T09:15:15.251Z -- pukiwiki%20development%20team -- pukiwiki
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in PukiWiki versions 1.4.5 to 1.5.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to execute a malicious script via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-36350|2024-08-03T10:00:04.537Z -- pukiwiki%20development%20team -- pukiwiki
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in PukiWiki versions 1.3.1 to 1.5.3 allows a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.
